c74object.name: vdbtoa~
c74object.description:
vdbtoa~ provides a CPU efficient version of dbtoa~ using SIMD operations.
vdbtoa~ takes any given signal representing a deciBel value and outputs a signal which is a linear value conversion of the input.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Convert a deciBel gain value to a linear value and output
method.description: A signal representing a gain/attenuation, expressed in deciBels. It is converted to a linear value and output as a signal.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: The linear value output as a signal.
